locations.name: Copenhagen
locations.description: Denmark's capital, the starting point, known for Nyhavn harbour, royal palaces, Danish design, and the concept of 'hygge'.

locations.name: Stockholm
locations.description: Sweden's capital, spread across 14 islands, featuring the medieval Gamla Stan (Old Town) and stylish districts.

locations.name: Oslo
locations.description: Norway's capital, the final destination, located on the Oslofjord and known for modern architecture, museums, and access to nature.
